page.title: 06Hunton and Arrathorne School
page.content: Our school was{established in 1878 to serve the above villages. Over 100 children were once taught in the two classrooms. Today they are occupied by only {27 primary pupils and two staff, but are full of lots of books, modern equipment and visual aids to help us. I like Maths, English, Swimming and Topic best. We all swim at Richmond Baths. Last year 3 classes gained gold medals in the Dolphin Trophy. Our mums help with cars on such outings. Some of my class had never been on a train before March 85. We went to London for the day to see the Egyptian treasures in the British Museum. Our{canteen}is behind the school. All but two of us eat here daily. Hot meals, 67p per day, are delivered by taxi.Twelve children eat packed lunch. We have two dinner ladies, a caretaker and a clerical assistant.
